review_text: A couple of spelling mistakes, the one that stood out most is using 'slut' instead of 'slug'.  Other than that, it was a great course that took a greenhorn like me to the next level of understanding it better.
Great course for optimizing the own Wordpress Page!
Good source of technical SEO insights.
It's a good course to learn the best practices for technical WordPress SEO.

It's a well-structured course which sadly repeats the common mistake most online web development teachers tend to - I mean overestimating WordPress websites. 
As the instructor shows and as I know from WordPress backend development, these kinds of installations have a deep folder density, which leads to slower websites and worse SEO. Unlike normal websites which are just coded with HTML5, CSS3, a JavaScript framework like jQuery, and PHP, browser crawlers need to dig through all the installation folders, subfolders like wp-content, and templates like single.php, functions.php, or simple page templates. 
Just because WordPress is an easy-to-use CMS, it doesn't mean it's good for SEO. To repeat me, the larger the website installation filesize sum, the worse your ranking might be and the poorer your website's performance as well.
One Of The Best SEO Course For Beginners.
A great course for beginners and advanced people
I have learn lots of new things from this course. It's an awesome course.

This class was full of good knowledge. However the referenced website saltandsimple.com is no longer up so it was challenging to follow along with that part. Also the quiz questions were often obscure and in some instances NOT related to the course material.
very helpful to understand the technical SEO of wordpress.
Few slides are very long and stretched.

Decent course I guess, but it has a lot of misspellings here and there and also I've lost it with the "heading tag value" related test question, where 4 options were shown, but 3 of them were in blank. After selecting the one that wasn't blank, the test told me I was wrong :D
Organizing and good overview of the topics step by step.
